# And

<!-- This file was generated - DO NOT CHANGE IT MANUALLY -->

Excel AND(argument1; argument2 ...argument30): Returns TRUE if all the arguments are considered TRUE, and FALSE otherwise.

## Parameter

### Function name

The name of the Excel function

- ID: `functionName`
- Datatype: `string`
- Default Value: `AND`

## Advanced Parameter

`None`
